list.title: Service Booking Manager for Marking Machine Service
list.group: VB.Net Desktop App with SQL Server
list.desc: This software is developed under VB.Net programming language and save database data MS SQL Server 2014. This software is VB.Net Windows Form Application and It worked when you connect in office network (You cannot be access from outside network). And next, these all features which included in this software/system.

list.title: Chinnathorn's MyPort Website
list.group: React JS Frond-End framework and .NET Core Back-End API
list.desc: Current site which you opened is my online portfolio. The first web application on microservice system architecture. We use React JS to design modern and better performance UI and ASP.NET Core Web API Back-end to save visitor contact in our database.

list.title: Telesis Marking Control Software System
list.desc: Send data and marking controller software for Marking Controller to marking Chassis (Part of Vehicle) reason in vehicle industrial company. This software is developed in VB.Net language and worked with MySQL database and send data to Controller via RS232 Cable (Serialport).

list.title: PreOrder Platform
list.desc: It's e-commerce web system to manage imported pre-order products. This platform will migrate from .NET Framework to .NET Core 3.1, Docker Container support. (based on Linux) and powerful online store front-end with React JS. Also database supported both MySQL and SQL Server

list.title: Survey Platform Web Application
list.desc: Followed by last job, I developed survey platform for researching with the financial company. It can manage survey question which you want and smooth system with React JS framework and NodeJS server side to run better performance.

list.title: CPXDev ID
list.desc: CPXDev ID is a PaaS (Platform as a Service) platform developed as a user management tool, providing user convenience from registration, login, logout, and user data modification across multiple apps without the need to develop a system from scratch. It also offers APIs for accessing the system from the platform you create.
